Class FavouriteItem

java.lang.Object
Model.FavouriteItem
public class FavouriteItem extends Object
FavouriteItem class - Represents a single favorite item in a linked list structure. Stores information about favorited photos, videos, or screenshots. Provides static methods for linked list operations on favorite items.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    FavouriteItem.NodeHandler
    Functional interface for handling nodes during traversal.

  • Constructor Details

    • FavouriteItem

      public FavouriteItem(String title, String path, String type)
      Constructs a FavouriteItem with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the favorite item
      path - The file path to the item
      type - The type of item (photo, video, screenshot)

  • Method Details

      Gets the title of this favorite item.
      Returns:
      The title

    • getPath

      public String getPath()
      Gets the file path of this favorite item.
      Returns:
      The file path

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of this favorite item.
      Returns:
      The type (photo, video, or screenshot)

    • getNext

      public FavouriteItem getNext()
      Gets the next node in the linked list.
      Returns:
      The next FavouriteItem, or null if this is the last node

    • setNext

      public void setNext(FavouriteItem next)
      Sets the next node in the linked list.
      Parameters:
      next - The next FavouriteItem to link

    • addFirst

      public static void addFirst(FavouriteItem item)
      Adds a favorite item to the front of the linked list.
      Parameters:
      item - The FavouriteItem to add

    • addAt

      public static void addAt(int index, FavouriteItem item)
      Adds a favorite item at a specific index in the linked list. Index 0 adds at the beginning.
      Parameters:
      index - The position to insert the item (0-based)
      item - The FavouriteItem to add

    • removeAt

      public static void removeAt(int index)
      Removes a favorite item at a specific index from the linked list.
      Parameters:
      index - The position of the item to remove (0-based)

    • traverse

      public static void traverse(FavouriteItem.NodeHandler handler)
      Traverses the entire linked list and applies a handler to each node.
      Parameters:
      handler - The NodeHandler to apply to each node
